summary: DESIGN DEFECT IN  FORD ALUMINUM ENGINES CUSTOMER STATES THAT HE IS AN ENGINEER AND HE HAS REPAIRED MANY FORD CARS WITH THE SAME DEFECT**CC  THE CONSUMER STATED THEY WOULD LIKE FORD TO BE ACCOUNTABLE FOR THE ENGINE DEFECT IN ALL ENGINES RANGING FROM V6 TO V10 AND FOR FORD TO REPAIR THE DEFECT AT NO COST TO OWNERS.  *TR
